_comment: Copy this file to .claude/settings.json in your new projects and customize as needed
rules: Always test code changes before committing
Use clear, descriptive commit messages that explain why changes were made
Check for open issues before starting new work using 'gh issue list'
Reference issue numbers in commits when fixing bugs or adding features
Prefer editing existing files over creating new ones
Keep changes focused - avoid unnecessary refactoring beyond the task scope
Review changes with 'git diff' before committing
Handle errors gracefully with user-friendly error messages
Update documentation when adding new features
Use meaningful names for variables, functions, and files
Maintain consistent code style throughout the project

gitWorkflow.commitMessageFormat:
Title (50 chars)

Body:
- What changed
- Why it changed

Fixes #<issue> (if applicable)
